features.description: Initialize Next.js app in apps/web with App Router, TypeScript, Tailwind
steps: Run pnpm create next-app@latest apps/web --ts --tailwind --eslint --app --src-dir --import-alias "@/*"
Confirm apps/web/package.json exists and app router is enabled
Run pnpm --dir apps/web dev and load /
Verify default Next.js page renders with no console errors

features.description: Local-only environment config for legacy base URL
steps: Add .env.local with LEGACY_API_BASE_URL=http://localhost:4000
Create config helper to read LEGACY_API_BASE_URL
Log or surface config in a dev-only health page
Verify config loads when running pnpm --dir apps/web dev

features.description: Login page with standard request/response and cookie session (local demo)
steps: Create /login route with email + password fields only
Define login request shape: {"email":"...","password":"..."}
Define login response shape: {"user":{"id":"...","email":"...","name":"..."},"session":{"token":"...","expiresAt":"..."}}
Create /api/auth/login route to proxy to LEGACY_API_BASE_URL
On success, set httpOnly cookie "session" with the token (default localhost settings)
On failure, show a clear inline error message
Create /api/legacy/[...path] proxy route
Forward method, headers, and body to LEGACY_API_BASE_URL
Return legacy status and body as-is
Verify a sample request hits legacy API and returns data

features.description: Basic dashboard demo page after login
steps: Create /dashboard route with a simple layout shell
Gate /dashboard behind presence of session cookie
Fetch one real field via /api/legacy and render it
Verify /dashboard loads after login with no console errors
